>,,,did it lose its government approved status?

Not sure what you heard, but as far as I know, the NBTHK is up and running and healthy. A lot of the Japanese left to join the newly established Nihonto Bunka Shinko Kyokai (NBSK) but I can't elaborate on that, being a midwesterner looking in from the outside. Politics, I'm sure. 

Ron
STL
